com.google.cloud.examples.datastore.snippets

Class DatastoreSnippets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.examples.datastore.snippets.DatastoreSnippets

  • public class DatastoreSnippets
extends Object
    This class contains a number of snippets for the Datastore interface.
